title: Sustainable Travel and Tourism Planning
description: The planning and development of tourism destinations, agencies, and services from a sustainable development perspective. Emphasis on the economic, social and environmental impacts of tourism. Examination of alternative forms of tourism. Emphasis on sustainable tourism. Travel research and planning models. Field visits required. 3 lectures, 1 laboratory.
prerequisites: RPTA 210 or RPTA 260, RPTA 214 with C- or better, junior standing or consent of instructor
